title: Wealth Within Your Reach: Pera Mo, Palaguin Mo
description: This book tells us how to become more financially intelligent. This is a good read for people who have been working for quite a while and have not reached their financial goals. This is also a recommended reading material for young people so as to avoid the mistakes many have made. That they may be able to accumulate wealth early in life and not be a slave to work. The book is very practical and very easy to read.
author: Francisco J. Colayco
